document.full_text: three new hampshire men have been arrested in connection with the death of a maine woman who disappeared, leaving her toddler inside her abandoned idling car last month, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: three arrested in death of maine mother
lines_and_colors: three new hampshire men have been arrested in connection with the death of a maine woman who disappeared, leaving her toddler inside her abandoned idling car last month, authorities said on wednesday.
